messages.subject: Re: Easy-Bake oven pans
messages.msgSnippet: Specialty type kitchen shops have nice little fluted glass, porcelain or metal baking dishes, too, for individual size baking.  Call around and see what you
messages.messageBody:
Specialty type kitchen
shops have nice little fluted glass, porcelain or metal baking
dishes, too, for individual size baking. Call around and see what
you can find, or scout the thrift stores in your area.

Norma


Hey thanks! I LOVE thrift stores LOL. Specialty kitchen shops: there is a
Happy Hostess in Gahanna that carries baking and cake/candy making
accessories.....might be worth a shot....




Ang
Unschooling mom to
Megan(10) Ashlyn(3) Christian(1.5)
<A HREF="http://hometown.aol.com/unolist/index.html">UNO Unschoolers Network of Ohio</A>
<A HREF="http://members.aol.com/megamom08/page1.html">My Links Page MEGAMOM08</A>
